LanguageData.TKUtils.Groups.CommandTweaks.Label: Command Tweaks
LanguageData.TKUtils.Groups.Experimental.Label: Experimental
LanguageData.TKUtils.Groups.PawnCommands.Label: Pawn Commands
LanguageData.TKUtils.CommandTweaks.Label: Override Toolkit's command handler.
LanguageData.TKUtils.CommandTweaks.RichText.Label: Strip HTML tags from some content, like colored traits.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnCommands.Health.ShowSurgerie: Include queued surgeries in the health command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnCommands.Gear.ShowArmor.Labe: Include armor values in the gear command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnCommands.Gear.ShowWeapon.Lab: Include weapon in the gear command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnCommands.Gear.ShowApparel.La: Include apparel in the gear command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnCommands.Body.TempInGear.Lab: Include temperature tolerances in the gear command instead.
LanguageData.TKUtils.Experimental.Linker.Label: Periodically ensure viewers aren't disconnected from their pawns.
